memberdef.argsstring: (cache_entry_t *pentry, cache_inode_io_direction_t read_or_write, fsal_seek_t *seek_descriptor, fsal_size_t buffer_size, fsal_size_t *pio_size, fsal_attrib_list_t *pfsal_attr, caddr_t buffer, fsal_boolean_t *p_fsal_eof, hash_table_t *ht, cache_inode_client_t *pclient, fsal_op_context_t *pcontext, bool_t stable, cache_inode_status_t *pstatus)
memberdef.name: cache_inode_rdwr

detaileddescription.para: cache_inode_rdwr: Reads/Writes through the cache layer.

parameterdescription.para: [IN] entry in cache inode layer whose content is to be accessed.
[IN] a flag of type cache_content_io_direction_t to tell if a read or write is to be done.
[IN] absolute position (in the FSAL file) where the IO will be done.
[IN] size of the buffer pointed by parameter 'buffer'.
[OUT] the size of the io that was successfully made.
[OUT] the FSAL attributes after the operation.
write:[IN] read:[OUT] the buffer for the data.
[INOUT] the hashtable used for managing the cache.
[IN] ressource allocated by the client for the nfs management.
if FALSE, data will be written to unstable storage (for implementing write/commit) [OUT] returned status.

xrefdescription.para: : BUGAZEOMEU; gestion de la taille du fichier a prendre en compte.

briefdescription.para: Removes an entry of any type.

detaileddescription.para:
